website_summaries.verdict: This kayak provides the durability and stability of the Lifetime brand in a boat built for 2.
pros: Twin padded seats and multiple footrest positions, ideal for couples or parent and child
“High and Dry” seating keeps you off the wet kayak floor
Unlike many tandems, can also be used solo
cons: Not everyone likes the different level seat positions

customer_reviews.title: best choice for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time trying to find a sturdy kayak that could fit a 110 lb, wiggly rottweiler without risk of tipping. This kayak is perfect! Moves easily, and so stable I can pull my dog out of the water in the middle of the lake without any fear for tipping over; we can even fit two adults AND the dog when we needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Love this kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Not the fastest, but maneuvers & rides excellent! You can sit sideways and get to your cooler, sit extra people on it, stand on it, crawl up to the front of it, it's got a big handle on the front so you can to it with a motorboat safely also! Nice kayak! My dog can't grip and stay on the front section though, I'm gonna have to get some grip stickers for the front to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver, a little heavy for 1 person
customer_reviews.text: Fun! I bought this for my 21-year old son, who has kayaked in a bay and ocean in NJ. I know very little about kayaks, (more about canoes) so I learned about 'sit on top'. We used this on a large lake in GA, which is flat. It was super easy to get into and to drag onto the shore. I am not confident in my 'water skills', but this was easy to maneuver. It moved and steered well. The only difficult thing is getting it on top of the car. Maybe this will take practice. My son said he could do it, but I think it definitely requires 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: gatraineryogainstructor

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought it for my husband, 10 year old daughter and I to use together on the lake. Handles all of us with plenty of room; we all fished. Floats great, tracks nicely, really quick. And oars and backrests included. Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.author: mberwise1

customer_reviews.title: Very awkward
customer_reviews.text: This kayak is not worth the money. It is suppose to be a two person kayak but the seats are so close together, you are constantly hitting paddles. Also, when one person is paddling, it will not move. It is too clumsy and awkward. The last stray was while we were taking it off our SUV roof. It slipped out of our hands and put a dent in the side of our vehicle. There are no good grips for maneuvering. $500 to repair.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Just the kayaks we needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to have at our beachfront home in Cabo. We wanted two-man, stable and simple kayaks for paddling around in the cove and perhaps further out into the sea. They were a big hit with our 30+ year old kids over the New Year's break. the only complaint I heard is that they require two guys to carry them the 75 yards or so to/from the ocean. I just ordered a wheel set for kayaks to ease this process. And I ordered a rack to facilitate hanging them out of the way in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun water craft
customer_reviews.text: When we first started using this it was a lot of fun. It will hold two adults and one very large dog that enjoys riding on a kayak. However after about a month it started absorbing water, I can only think it most have some small cracks in the bottom. We were super careful to carry it over the rocks, having lived around saltwater beaches my entire life I've learned to take care of our water toys, boats and misc. items that we use in the saltwater. I would caution who you buy this from and would make sure their return policy is compatible with your way of doing business.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Stable
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. She loves it and uses it weekly, sometimes several times in the same week. It works well with two adults. No other kayak we've tried matches it for stability. No, it's not the fastest, but who cares if you are just paddling around the lake to get some exercise and watch the sunset. She discovered that it fits inside her Ford Flex with all of the seats down, so hauling it is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good kayak! Only the seats is the bed thing about it! The seat doesn't stay steady they slide off our back and it's not good at all very uncomfortable! The kayak stability is the best that I've seen in my life it's impossible to tip over the kayak!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: fun and function
customer_reviews.text: We love these. I purchased these to use on the gulf coast of Florida. It's great to have a boat that fits myself, my kids, and my dogs! Fun and function, great for beginners and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: HRae

customer_reviews.title: Manta Lifetime 10 Foot, Two Person Tandem Sit-on Kayak with Padded Backrests
customer_reviews.text: excellent. Well it's easy because I can load it myself and put on top of my car. I got a 2002 Ford Escape
customer_reviews.author: Erly Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: After our first laughable outing, we got the hang of it. We love kayaking. Please watch a couple videos for beginners before you venture out. Then, you will do great.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: The stability of this craft should offer My Lady some stability and inner peace and add More Love into Her Heart
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Very Safe Kayak to go into the Canyons off Coos Bay that are very shallow and a vehicle that would feel safe to My Lady with Alzheimer's! We have always been an active Outdoors couple and this Kayak will allow us to do things up those canyons that we could not do with a normal kayak and/or an inflated one! The stability of this craft should offer My Lady some stability and inner peace and add More Love into Her Heart! Again, Thank You for providing an Excellent Product to an Old Guy who still wants His Lady to share in the Outdoors Fun! Sincerely; Jim E. Dockter Coos Bay, Oregon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good kayak
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Sturdy. Durable. Holds 2 people easily and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: painter

customer_reviews.title: But easy to float
customer_reviews.text: People have already named it "the banana". But easy to float, stable, and light enough my kids can handle themselves. Great kayak to give the kids and get your feet wet - can upgrade later if everyone keeps it up.
customer_reviews.author: Dillard Travel Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great but only one backrest
customer_reviews.text: We love the kayak, but it came with only one backrest (it says 2 in the description), and one of the paddles was peeled-off. Other than that, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dey

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. works wonderfully but a little too heavy for me and my 8 year old son to manage with out additional help.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Allen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We used our kayak once successfully. The second time after about 15 minutes, the cavity filled with water due to faulty manufacturing and we fell into the (toxic) Chicago River. Of course this happened after our Amazon return window closed, and the manufacturer will not issue us a refund, only a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! Very pleased. Get a lot of comments wherever we go.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kayak. Great for kids and adults. I love the color, seats are comfortable. Very much fun in the ocean
customer_reviews.author: Yuli

customer_reviews.title: To narrow in the front ! 😞Of the Kayak
customer_reviews.text: We don't like it one person sit higher in back ! It doesn't look like Kayak looks like banana boat !
customer_reviews.author: Debra G.

customer_reviews.title: This is fun in moving water
customer_reviews.text: This is fun in moving water. In a lake or swamp its bulky and heavy to paddle. Fun if you are not going far or if you are just floating.
customer_reviews.author: vlaughlin

customer_reviews.title: great buy, could not find anything even remotely similar ...
customer_reviews.text: great buy, could not find anything even remotely similar local! we are loving it and the price is too awesome AND FREE SHIPPING
customer_reviews.author: Misty Coats

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Kayak is well made, sturdy, and stable. Arrived on time. Delivered to my front door.
customer_reviews.author: Sidro

customer_reviews.title: Boat is great
customer_reviews.text: Boat is great but shipping was a little rough it with two gouges on it but no holes, a little slow but good kayak
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Sit On Top Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Just received the kayak kit and found it in perfect condition. The boat, backrests and paddles are mint. Although I haven't put this into the water yet, being a two kayak owner already, i know this will suit my needs in getting the kids indoctrinated into kayaking...perfectly !!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lent

customer_reviews.title: Great Kayak!
customer_reviews.text: Although it took a really long time to get it, this is a terrific kayak! Great value because it includes seat backs and paddles. We use it for paddling in canals, lakes and Gulf of Mexico. Very stabile, and fun to use, even for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Bunty

customer_reviews.title: Great kayak
customer_reviews.text: Great kayak. Size makes it easy to load on top of the car but still fits backpack cooler, etc. It could use a handle on the other side and at the end. Color is great for being seen by boats. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Shecter

customer_reviews.title: Great fun but a little too cumbersome for one person to handle
customer_reviews.text: It's a super fun kayak for the three of us, but I agree with some of the reviews which said that it might be better to buy 2 small kayaks. I can't move this kayak by myself, it's too heavy (I'm 5'2 and 120 lbs). so we need to all be available to do this. I wish I had bought a smaller one for just my son and me.
customer_reviews.author: Fabienne Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shipping practices
customer_reviews.text: Product came in filthy plastic Ends we’re exposed and got black grease all over it I hope I can clean it with magic eraser
customer_reviews.author: Barbra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and store
customer_reviews.text: Very stable and ideal for one or three. Easy to carry and store.
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Great Tandem Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Great Kayak for us first time kayakers. My wife and I are now enjoying early morning gliding through the lake waters.
customer_reviews.author: H. Terry Harbin

customer_reviews.title: STURDY AND AFFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: ,Y GRANDCHILDRE REALLY ENJOYED THE KAYAK, AND I FELT COMFORTABLE WITH THIS STURDY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'll change this if they make it right. We ...
customer_reviews.text: I'll change this if they make it right. We couldn't use it right away due to the cold weather. When we took off the bubble wrap to take it out first time, we found a hole in the hull and the scupper drain was also torn away from the floor of the boat. If we had put in, it likely would have sunk. If they get us a replacement and it actually is seaworthy, I'll change the review.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kayak!
customer_reviews.text: This kayak rocks! I bought it for family and friends that come up to the lake. It is extremely well designed (for example, it has 3 large cup holders to hold drinks and pockets on the back of the seat rests to hold your stuff). It is light enough for me to carry myself, it is very durable and sturdy, it is very stable in the water and nearly impossible to capsize, the color is very good safety-wise. I'm very happy with this product. It's one of the best purchases I've made in a long time. Buy it and have some fun!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed these kayaks. Very durable, although quite heavy and oddly shaped. Able to fit two of these bad boys on top of my Honda Pilot with Yakima crossbar and the Malone J-racks.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this so much we bought 2 more! Great for 1,2, or 3 people! Sturdy and stable! Not a kayak for speed, though, if that is what you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: LSB

customer_reviews.title: Years of fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Camping trips to lakes or just day trips. Gift to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tandem kayak. It's a little heavy, but very stable in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kayaking for the family
customer_reviews.text: I have found this kayak to be incredibly stable. It can accomodate two adults, and if you want kayaking for the whole family, there is room in the center for a little one. I would not really advise putting three adults on it. This has been an excellent product at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starter Kayak
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kayak for beginners. My husband and I just bought this and have really enjoyed it so far. Sturdy, not tippy, easy to maneuver for two people. Best part was it being delivered to our doorstep!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Routh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: ENJOYED MY FIRST AND SECOND BOATING EXPERIENCE, ARRIVED IN PERFRECT WORKING CONDITION.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: perfect. we love it
customer_reviews.text: perfect. we love it. paddles are a little cheap but better cheap paddles than no paddles seat backs are better than i expected!
customer_reviews.author: jennnnnay

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and Sinks Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in November as a Christmas present for my husband. The first time we used it was a week ago and it sunk. I attributed that to my dog jumping off. However, it had a lot of water in the hull making it very difficult to drag or lift. Today I used it again, no dog this time, and it sunk again and filled with water. When we turned it over we saw a crack in the bottom that was obviously there from the beginning. I am so upset. This was used but not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sturdy build and surprisingly lightweight. it's easy to transport, and is tons of fun on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for first-time boaters
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the novice and the price was reasonable. Would recommend this product to all as a first time boating experience
customer_reviews.author: Jim Caffrey

customer_reviews.title: It met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Lifetime Manta Kayak It is very good for the price, better than more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it has great balance for us older folks
customer_reviews.text: It's a little slow. But, it has great balance for us older folks. Which is what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia D Leicht

customer_reviews.title: Great Ocean Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Very stable, fits 3 people and easy to haul to the beach
customer_reviews.author: aframe!

customer_reviews.title: 10 ft dual kayak
customer_reviews.text: far exceeded my expectations...paddles soooooo easily.......the only negative I can possibly think of is that it does not have a carrying handle on both sides....
customer_reviews.author: STEVE HOFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Fun Kayak
customer_reviews.text: Our grand kids love this kayak. We have a cabin at a lake and they use it constantly when we're there. It's not great for long distance but a fun kid adventure and good for getting out to the anchored boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very stable and dry
customer_reviews.text: Pros: heavy capacity, dual hulls keep it stable, looks good, came with seats, straps, cup holders built in, rod holders, price was good Cons: not as fast as some others which should be expected, width made it awkward to load on top of the car Overall very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ted S

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Kayak Awesome Price
customer_reviews.text: Having recently moved to Catalina island, we bought this tandem kayak to maneuver the ocean currents and allow us to explore the coves with our kids. This kayak has met and exceeded my expectations. It is extremely sturdy, maneuvers well and the price was fantastic In fact, our friend could NOT believe how much we paid for it. He spent far more for his single kayak. The only issue I had was that it is still very heavy as most kayaks are. We just bought the wheel trailer and now that issue is resolved. I highly recommend this kayak as it is stable even with a family of 4 on board.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This Kayak is very well made. We weren't sure what to expect and we are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vanessay865

customer_reviews.title: I'm on a boat!
customer_reviews.text: This Kayak is really stable although you will get a good workout if you expect to travel by paddle. If you prefer river powerl; it's a comfortable ride. It also sits somewhat deep with 2 adults and may end up riding you down some of the more shallow areas. All that said, it really was a good deal for the $449 price, and the free 2 day prime shipping which left a Kayak in my office lobby was priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice and stable but a bit slow
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for my wife and I both in fresh and salt water. Quite wide at the back and slow compared to many other kayaks. I recommend for beginners and recreational paddlers, probably not for a serious paddler or someone who wants to keep up with a group.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Scrapple

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very stable on the water and perfect for two plus storage
customer_reviews.author: C M Schaar Walden

customer_reviews.title: Good kayak.
customer_reviews.text: Fun kayak. Good value at 475.00. But slowwwww shipping!! It is worth the price with two paddles and seat backs. Fun for all.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first time kayaker, at the age of 50. This kayak is stable and easy to paddle. I've kayaked solo AND with my 61 year old aunt and it was enjoyable both ways! Easy to get in and out of, easy to maneuver in the water, easily put in and taken out of the water. It's love, I tell you!!!
customer_reviews.author: dd in natchez

customer_reviews.title: This kayak is to hard to maneuver! I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: This kayak is to hard to maneuver! I bought it for my daughter and she finds it so difficult to maneuver that she's unable to use it. I would lke to speak with someone about it please.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Adams

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a rental kayak but great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the Kayak from Amazon quickly, it was easy to get around by myself. It seems to be well made, I took it out today on the local resivoir and it was very stable and easy to manuver. I would recommend it to anybody that will use it on weekends once and a while. I got a few compliments on the quality from some local kayakers, but it definately looks like a rental. The back support is a plus, the only thing i might change would be to get a longer paddle, it is very wide for the one it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Barf bag

customer_reviews.title: love it lifetime manta kayak
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted to have kayak which is stable. Lifetime manta kayak is perfect for family who has very little or no experience of kayaking. Four people was on the kayak in windy condition 25 mph. Very stable and most of the time cruise straight without diverting left or right. Did solo kayaking and its fun. Everyone called this kayak big yellow banana. Easy to load and carry on minivan.
customer_reviews.author: Atiq

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We can sit our family of four on here. About 335 pounds. Two adults and two 6 year olds. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's a nice little kayak
customer_reviews.text: it's a nice little kayak. But definitely made for more fun and than speed if that's what your looking for, but if you have kidswho want to go on the river on lake or you just want to go fishing this is great!
customer_reviews.author: S.Tut

customer_reviews.title: Lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great Kayak lots of fun to get out on it, but next time I buy any kind of boat it's going to have a motor on it.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Thompson

customer_reviews.title: loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: I don't think you can turn this kayak over, even in rough water and than was my wife,s biggest fear, you see were both 73. Great fun and worth every dime..
customer_reviews.author: robert h. nelson

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend because it attracts bugs here in Florida
customer_reviews.text: The color-green, do not recommend because it attracts bugs here in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: diazpty

customer_reviews.title: ABOVE THE REST
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS GREAT, STABLE, AND A LOT OF FUN, CAN NOT BE BEAT FOR THE PRICE, WE HAD 3 ADULTS ON THE KAYAK AND IT GLIDED THRU THE WATER WITH NO PROBLEMS.
customer_reviews.author: SHAR

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is listed with two soft backrest, but mine arrived without them.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo Baquerizo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 y/o for his bday! He loved it!! It's super sturdy! Was very pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm 57 years old and needed a pass time for evenings and weekends. I live near the water so I ordered this product......it is fantastic!......handles great.....with two or just me alone. I highly recommend this product. Great shipping with Amazon and fast!
customer_reviews.author: LadyV

customer_reviews.title: First kayak
customer_reviews.text: Very stable kayak for beginners.Paddles are too short and I will be purchasing longer ones.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Price

customer_reviews.title: Concerned
customer_reviews.text: Concerned. We got to use it a couple of times & had a blast, but it has 2 large cracks in it. Worried it's going to sink.
customer_reviews.author: Charles f day

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a wedding present for my stepson and daughter in-law. It was delivered on time with everything included as listed. The only additional thing needed was life vests. My husband and I have kayaked for many years and we own a variety of kayaks. This is a really nice kayak. It will hold 3 people and appears to be very stable. A great deal at a great price. I am thrilled we bought it, our kids will really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: stargaze

customer_reviews.title: Its about what I expected
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used it four times on the Ohio River....its steady as advertised. My kids, 14 and 11, have also been in it with me and they both feel secure using it. I wish it came with a second carrying handle,,,it is a bit awkward to carry by one person. I think it is good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Stephens

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: HAD A BLAST WITH IT AT COAST! Me and my Husband played with it, fell out of it, plashed water with it and just had fun
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Reid

customer_reviews.title: Love the flexibility!
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate having to purchase just one kayak that can serve as a single, tandem and even add a third little one in the middle!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Jacklin

customer_reviews.title: After  almost 5 years of use ...
customer_reviews.text: including class 3 rapids, this craft is still going strong with no issues! It is sturdy and stable. It is fairly heavy but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Mystyria

customer_reviews.title: just arrived
customer_reviews.text: this kayak just arrived yesterday evening thank god cos it was dark when it arrived and my son was home but in his room .I helped the driver bring it behind the back yard .It initially looked huge but then in the morning time I got a better look at it and even though I havent opened the package yet it looks smaller but it looks awesome .Cant wait to see my sons face when he opens it for himself for christmass
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Djahed

customer_reviews.title: Tandem kayak
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the opportunity to try it out yet, so it is hard to rate it. Iphoping to try it soon
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all. It had not oars with the boat and was not the right boat. We ordered a 2 seater boat. It was purchased for my son's birthday and he had picked out online and is not happy about the purchase. Boat is only a one seater and we ordered a two seater
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this! Everyone calls it a banana but I love it lol. Very stable for the dog, myself, and my pet ducks. Impossible to flip. Wide and comfortable. Seat is great. Doesn't always stay straight. Is a bit slow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lifetime 10 Foot, Two Person Tandem Sit-on Kayak with Padded Backrests
feature_bullets: Hull Design Provides Ultra Stability and Great Tracking
Lightweight, 60 Lb Design,Ditty Trays and Shock Cord Straps to Secure Loose Items
Multiple Footrest Positions for Different Size Riders
